    Class Description
    Advance
    Move some armies from one of the current playerâ€™s territories (source) to an adjacent territory (target).
    AdvanceTest
    Test class for Advance Class
    Aggressive
    Aggressive Player:
    An aggressive computer player strategy that focuses on centralization of forces and then attack, i.e.
    AggressiveTest  
    Airlift
    Airlift: advance some armies from one of the current playerâ€™s territories to any another territory.
    AirliftTest
    This is the test class that checks the methods of Airlift class and asserts if the actual value equals to expected or not
    Benevolent
    Benevolent Player:
    A benevolent computer player strategy that focuses on protecting its weak countries (deploys on its weakest country, never attacks, then moves its armies in order to reinforce its weaker country).
    BenevolentTest  
    Blockade
    blockade: triple the number of armies on one of the current playerâ€™s territories and make it a neutral territory.
    BlockadeTest
    This is the Test class that checks the methods of Blockade class and asserts if actual value and expected values are same or not
    Bomb
    bomb: destroy half of the armies located on an opponentâ€™s territory that is adjacent to one of the current playerâ€™s territories.
    BombTest
    This class checks the methods of Bom class by using assert statement
    Border
    This class contains details of the border
    Details: Make Maps
    1 2 3 38 : the first number is the number of country and others are what country it is adjacent too
    BorderTest
    This class contains test details of Border class
    Cheater
    Cheater Player:
    A cheater computer player strategy whose issueOrder() method conquers all the immediate neighboring enemy countries, and then doubles the number of armies on its countries that have enemy neighbors.
    CheaterTest  
    ConquestMapHandler
    This class includes methods to read and write map files readMapFile also throws IOException
    ConquestMapHandlerTest  
    Continent
    This class contains details of the continent
    ContinentTest
    This class contains test details of Continent class
    Country
    This class contains details of the country
    CountryTest
    This class contains test details of Country class
    Deploy
    deploy: place some armies on one of the current playerâ€™s territories.
    DeployTest
    This class checks the methods of Deploy class using assert method
    Diplomacy
    diplomacy: until the end of the turn, you and the target player cannot attack each other.
    DiplomacyTest
    this class tests the methods of diplomacy class using assert method
    DominationMapHandler
    This class includes methods to read and write map files readMapFile also throws IOException
    DominationMapHandlerTest  
    Edit
    This is the abstract class that extends phase class in this phase only showmap command executes, rest all prints the invalid command message
    End
    This class is used to give output when the game has ended
    EndTest
    This class checks the method implementation of End class
    GameEngine
    Game Engine class that starts with "loadmap" command and automatically ends after mainloop phases
    GameEngineTest
    Game Engine test class
    GameLoader
    This is the GameLoader class that loads the game file and read the file
    GameLoaderTest  
    GameSaver  
    GameSaverTest  
    GameStats
    This class includes methods that return- Map name, GameNumber and Result
    GameStatsTest  
    Graph
    Adjacency Matrix representation of the Maps
    GraphTest
    Test class for Graph
    Human
    Human Player:
    A human player that requires user interaction to make decisions.
    HumanTest  
    LogEntryBuffer
    This is the LogEntryBuffer class which extends Observable and notify observers
    LogEntryBufferTest
    This class tests the setter and getter method of LogEntryBuffer class
    LogUtil  
    LogWriter
    This class implements observer interface.
    Main
    GameDriver
    MainPlay
    this class extends play class State of the state pattern
    MainTest  
    Map
    Map class contains the details of the:
    1.list of continents in a map.
    MapEditor
    A singleton class to do all the things required for map-editing.
    MapEditorTest
    Test class for MapEditor
    MapHandlerAdapter
    This class extends the DominationMapHandler class This enable the application to read/write from/to a file using "conquest" game map format.
    MapHandlerAdapterTest  
    MapTest
    Test class for Map
    Observable
    Class that implements the connection/disconnection mechanism between IObservers and observables (subject).
    Observer
    Interface class for the Observer, which forces all views to implement the update method.
    Odd
    Random strategy
    OddTest  
    Order
    This interface is used to execute these methods which are common to different types of cards Ex: execute() is used in Advance, Airlift, Blockade etc.
    OrderCreationPhase
    This is the OrderCreationPhase class that extends the MainPlay class This class takes the orders for players and place the reinforcement armies Deploy, Advance, Bomb, blockade, Airlift, Diplomacy - These commands works here, for rest of the commands it throws invalid command message to the user
    OrderCreationPhaseTest
    This class checks the method implementation of Order Creation phase class
    OrderExecutionPhase
    This class is used to execute all the order once the orders have been created by the players in round robin fashion It also removes the player from the existing list of it has no country owned to it and eventually checks if the game has ended
    OrderExecutionPhaseTest
    This class checks the method implementation of Order Execution phase class
    Phase
    This class is an abstract class for defining states in the state pattern
    PhaseTest  
    Play
    This class extends phase class It executes showMap command and for loadMap, editContinent, editCountry, editNeighbour,saveMap, editMap, validateMap, setPlayers, assignCountries, reinforce, createorder, executeorder it shows invalid command message
    Player
    This class contains details of the Player
    PlayerTest
    This class contains Test details about Player class
    PlaySetup
    This class is used to set the game play by loading the map, creating the players and assigning respective countries and adding and removing players as and when required
    PlaySetupTest
    This class checks the method implementation of Play setup class
    PlayTest
    This class checks the method implementation of Play class
    PostLoad
    This class extends the PostLoad class and the constructor returns the output from method super()
    PostLoadTest
    This class implements the methods of PostLoad class and checks whether expected output is equals to actual output or not.
    Preload
    This is the preload class that extends Edit Class In this, only editMap command works, rest all shows invalid command message to the user
    PreloadTest
    This class checks the method implementation of PreLoad class and tests whether expected output of these methods are equal to actual outputs or not
    ReinforcementPhase
    This is the ReinforcementPhase class that extends MainPlay class Each player receives the number of armies Attack and fortify- shows invalid command message in Reinforcement phase
    ReinforcementPhaseTest
    This class checks the method implementation of Reinforcement phase class
    Strategy
    Strategy class to process the type of player.
    Territory  
    TournamentCreator
    This class will: 1.
    TournamentCreatorTest
    TournamentCreator test class to test conditions if map is between 1 to 5 if no of players is between 2 to 4 if no of games is between 1 to 5
    ValidateMap
    Class ValidateMap is used to check whether the given map is directed graph or not.
    ValidateMapTest
    Test class for ValidateMap
